About Me
My name is Liron Tzarfati, 24 years old, a graduate of the QA course at Svcollege, I currently test software at the "Cambium" company, In my free time, I am a programming teacher who conducts online and private tutorials for children through Minecraft and Roblox games that combine Javascript and Lua language programming. I really like to teach and pass on my knowledge and learn from those around me. I am very connected to the world of testing.. I want to be a part of changes and solutions in the technological field.
